titles.title: To amend the Wilderness Act to ensure that the use of bicycles, wheelchairs, strollers, and game carts is not prohibited in Wilderness Areas, and for other purposes.
To amend the Wilderness Act to ensure that the use of bicycles, wheelchairs, strollers, and game carts is not prohibited in Wilderness Areas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 18.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-1032.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 805.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: This bill amends the Wilderness Act to declare that provisions of such Act prohibiting the use of motorized vehicles, aircraft, or other forms of mechanical transport shall not prohibit the use of motorized wheelchairs, non-motorized wheelchairs, non-motorized bicycles, strollers, wheelbarrows, survey wheels, or game carts within any wilderness areas.
